item.title: Configuring binder
item.description: Binder uses gcfg (INI-style config files for go structs). [binder] port = 8808 tokensize = 25 tokendictionary = "0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz" [redis] host = "localhost:6379" password = "" [ssl] usetls = true servercert = deps/test.crt serverkey = deps/test.key The config uses some pretty sane defaults but the following fields are configurable: [binder] port: the port the API listens on. loglevel: the verbosity of logs, acceptable fields are ‘info’, ‘cluster’, ‘debug’, ‘error’.
